text: بِنَصْرِ ٱللَّهِ ۚ يَنصُرُ مَن يَشَآءُ ۖ وَهُوَ ٱلْعَزِيزُ ٱلرَّحِيمُ

translation.en.sahih: In the victory of Allah. He gives victory to whom He wills, and He is the Exalted in Might, the Merciful.
translation.id.indonesian: Karena pertolongan Allah. Dia menolong siapa yang dikehendaki-Nya. Dan Dialah Maha Perkasa lagi Penyayang.
